entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
